channel.title: How do you upload to soundcloud?
channel.description: Do you upload straight to soundcloud like me? Do you convert it into an audio file first? I am just curious because I don't know how people upload without the black labels.

item.title: How do you upload to soundcloud?

item.description:
i upload straight to soundcloud because i don’t care about the quality of my audio i am lazy

item.title: How do you upload to soundcloud?

item.description:

item.title: How do you upload to soundcloud?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Export to uncompressed wave and usually run it through Grand Finale. Then upload to SC from audioshare. Fix the art and stuff after the fact.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you upload to soundcloud?

item.title: How do you upload to soundcloud?
item.dc:creator: Maland2016
item.description:
I used to save as m4a’s back when I started out. Now I save as uncompressed wavs and go from there. Then I make a cover art and there we go.
